title: House & Property in Jaffna Town
details: 2.25 Lacham (Parapu - approximately 22.25 perches) Land with 4 roomed house, large living & dining, long corridor, wc, good well water. Additional shop space of approximately 400 sq feet with rent income potential. Minutes to Jaffna Railway Station, Jaffna Teaching Hospital, Nallur Temple, Grand Bazzar, Kachcheri, etc. Variety of fruit trees. Vacant possession. Land Value only expected - motivated seller.
